EmailTemplate.name: CallBack Contacts
EmailTemplate.subject: Call Back Contacts for {!Entity_CP__c.Name} need your approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User You are receiving this notification because {!Entity_CP__c.Name} has Call Back Contacts that need your approval:
Requestor: {!Entity_CP__c.LastModifiedBy}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
